string.string:
Memory Game Instructions

 Objective:
 The goal is to match all pairs of cards in the shortest time possible.

 1. Starting the Game:
 • Tap any card to flip it over and reveal the image.
 • The timer will automatically start as soon as you flip the first card.

 2. How to Play:
 • Flip two cards at a time to try to find a matching pair.
 • If the two cards match, they will stay face up.
 • If they do not match, they will flip back over after a short pause, so you can remember their positions.

 3. Winning the Game:
 • The game is complete once all card pairs are matched.
 • Your final score is determined by how quickly you find all pairs.

 4. Timer and Moves:
 • The timer at the top of the screen shows how long you’ve been playing.
 • Try to find all pairs before the timer reaches a high number!

 5. Restarting the Game:
 • You can press the Reset button at any time to restart the game with a new card arrangement.
